What is this?

I tried making Bowser's fury in 3 hours for Trijam 105

Your are BOXCAT. You are visiting the islands for a summer vacation, but then a giant monster ( which is unrelated to a famous plumber's arch-nemesis) shows up and ruins the view by sleeping in the middle of the ocean. You must defeat the kaiju with the power of BOXING to restore peace! Collect all 5 amulets (1 per island) to unlock the power of BOXING!

Note: BOXCAT can swim, and is also a very strong cat.

Graphics and code made during 3 hours,
music and sound created before the jam.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  •  Spacebar/Shift/X: punch (when you're big)
  • F4: fullscreen (windows only)
